Scripts.OnEvent: if (PowaAuras.DebugEvents and event ~= "COMBAT_LOG_EVENT_UNFILTERED") then PowaAuras:DisplayText("Event:", event) end PowaAuras[event](PowaAuras, ...)

Scripts.OnEnter: if (self:IsEnabled()) then if (self.aide) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) end end

PowaColor_SwatchBg:SetVertexColor(NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.aideColor, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

PowaGradientColor_SwatchBg:SetVertexColor(NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.aideSecondaryColor, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

Scripts.OnLoad: self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self:SetMinMaxValues(-30, 3) self:SetValue(0.00) self:SetValueStep(0.05) PowaModelPositionZSliderText:SetText("Model Z: 0") PowaModelPositionZSliderLow:SetText("-30") PowaModelPositionZSliderHigh:SetText("3")

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.tooltipText, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

Scripts.OnLoad: self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self:SetMinMaxValues(0.01, 5.0) self:SetValue(1) self:SetValueStep(0.01) PowaBarAuraSizeSliderText:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.nomTaille..": 100%") PowaBarAuraSizeSliderLow:SetText("1%") PowaBarAuraSizeSliderHigh:SetText("500%")

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

Scripts.OnLoad: self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self.aide = PowaAuras.Text.aideDuration self:SetMinMaxValues(0, 60) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(0.25) PowaBarAuraDurationSliderText:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.nomDuration..": 0.00 sec") PowaBarAuraDurationSliderLow:SetText("0 sec") PowaBarAuraDurationSliderHigh:SetText("60 sec")

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

Scripts.OnLoad: self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self:SetMinMaxValues(-700, 700) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(1) PowaTimerCoordXSliderText:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.nomPos.." X: 0") PowaTimerCoordXSliderLow:SetText("-700") PowaTimerCoordXSliderHigh:SetText("700")

self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self:SetMinMaxValues(-400, 400) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(1) PowaTimerCoordYSliderText:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.nomPos.." Y: 0") PowaTimerCoordYSliderLow:SetText("-400") PowaTimerCoordYSliderHigh:SetText("400")

self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self:SetMinMaxValues(0.01, 5) self:SetValue(1) self:SetValueStep(0.01) PowaTimerSizeSliderText:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.nomTaille..": 100%") PowaTimerSizeSliderLow:SetText("1%") PowaTimerSizeSliderHigh:SetText("500%")

self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self:SetMinMaxValues(0, 1) self:SetValue(1) self:SetValueStep(0.01) PowaTimerAlphaSliderText:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.nomAlpha..": 100%") PowaTimerAlphaSliderLow:SetText("0%") PowaTimerAlphaSliderHigh:SetText("100%")

self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self.aide = PowaAuras.Text.aideTimerDuration self:SetMinMaxValues(0, 60) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(0.25) PowaTimerDurationSliderText:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.nomTimerDuration..": 0 sec") PowaTimerDurationSliderLow:SetText("0 sec") PowaTimerDurationSliderHigh:SetText("60 sec")

Scripts.OnEnter: PowaTimerColor_SwatchBg:SetVertexColor(NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.aideTimerColor, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

Scripts.OnLoad: self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self.aide = PowaAuras.Text.aidePowaTimerInvertAuraSlider self:SetMinMaxValues(0, 600) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(0.25) PowaTimerInvertAuraSliderText:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.nomTimerInvertAura..": 0 sec") PowaTimerInvertAuraSliderLow:SetText("0 sec") PowaTimerInvertAuraSliderHigh:SetText("600 sec")

self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self:SetMinMaxValues(-700, 700) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(1) PowaStacksCoordXSliderText:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.nomPos.." X: 0") PowaStacksCoordXSliderLow:SetText("-700") PowaStacksCoordXSliderHigh:SetText("700")

self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self:SetMinMaxValues(-400, 400) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(1) PowaStacksCoordYSliderText:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.nomPos.." Y: 0") PowaStacksCoordYSliderLow:SetText("-400") PowaStacksCoordYSliderHigh:SetText("400")

self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self:SetMinMaxValues(0.01, 5) self:SetValue(1) self:SetValueStep(0.01) PowaStacksSizeSliderText:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.nomTaille..": 100%") PowaStacksSizeSliderLow:SetText("1%") PowaStacksSizeSliderHigh:SetText("500%")

self:EnableMouseWheel(true) self:SetMinMaxValues(0, 1) self:SetValue(1) self:SetValueStep(0.01) PowaStacksAlphaSliderText:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.nomAlpha..": 100%") PowaStacksAlphaSliderLow:SetText("0%") PowaStacksAlphaSliderHigh:SetText("100%")

Scripts.OnEnter: PowaStacksColor_SwatchBg:SetVertexColor(NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(PowaAuras.Text.aideStacksColor, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

Scripts.OnClick: PanelTemplates_SelectTab(self) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab2) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab3) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab4) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab5) PowaBarConfigFrameEditor1:Show() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor2:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor4:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor3:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor5:Hide() PlaySound("igCharacterInfoTab", PowaMisc.SoundChannel)

PanelTemplates_SelectTab(self) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab1) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab3) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab4) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab5) PowaBarConfigFrameEditor1:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor2:Show() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor4:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor3:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor5:Hide() PlaySound("igCharacterInfoTab", PowaMisc.SoundChannel)

PanelTemplates_SelectTab(self) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab1) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab2) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab4) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab5) PowaBarConfigFrameEditor3:Show() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor1:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor2:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor4:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor5:Hide() PlaySound("igCharacterInfoTab", PowaMisc.SoundChannel)

PanelTemplates_SelectTab(self) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab1) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab2) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab3) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab5) PowaBarConfigFrameEditor4:Show() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor1:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor2:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor3:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor5:Hide() PowaAuras:UpdateTimerOptions() PlaySound("igCharacterInfoTab", PowaMisc.SoundChannel)

PanelTemplates_SelectTab(self) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab1) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab2) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab3) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab4) PowaBarConfigFrameEditor5:Show() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor1:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor2:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor4:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor3:Hide() PowaAuras:UpdateStacksOptions() PlaySound("igCharacterInfoTab", PowaMisc.SoundChannel)
